_sText: >__NEW______UP DATE_______NEW__< >__NEW______UP DATE_______NEW__< >__NEW______UP DATE_______NEW__< The controls are First activate the Helicopter by pressing "E" on a blue box to use the controls Mouse1: is to fly W: is to move forward S: is to move backword A: is to turn left D: is to turn right Hit: If you let GO THE MOUSE it WILL LAND SLOWWWWW now not FAST All the doors are done by a button and it will restart at 10 sec. then it will close. PS: If you are going to but this on your map. Keep the Helicopter in the same way as it is. If you move it like right or left to change the view. I don't think the doors will open the right way. So you might have to fix it. If you want to change things around you can. The vmf and bps files are in. here is the old one if u still want it but you need to REED what i wrote down http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/1332 >__NEW______UP DATE_______NEW__< >>>>>>>>>Have fun!!!!!<<<<<<<<< Also there is a new map COMING SOON for css.
